meanings.definition: The quality or state of being without sense or meaning.
meanings.sent1: The senselessness of the situation left everyone confused.
meanings.sent2: The senselessness of his actions was evident to all.
meanings.sent3: The senselessness of wearing a winter coat in the summer made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The senselessness of the decision hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The senselessness of the puzzle made it impossible to solve.

meanings.definition: The act of lacking rationality or logic.
meanings.sent1: The senselessness of his argument was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The senselessness of the plan became apparent as things unraveled.
meanings.sent3: The senselessness of trying to fit a square peg into a round hole was comical.
meanings.sent4: The senselessness of the rules felt suffocating.
meanings.sent5: The senselessness of the maze made it impossible to find a way out.
